snippet: The head of the United States aid agency told Congress that the program was not meant to destabilize the Cuban government, only to promote open communication.
lead_paragraph: The head of the United States aid agency told Congress that the program was not meant to destabilize the Cuban government, only to promote open communication.

headline.main: Cuba Social Media Project Was No Plot, Agency Says
headline.print_headline: Cuba Social Media Project Was No Plot, Agency Says
